title: Proactiv Solution JUMBO Super Size Clarifying Night Cream 2.5oz
description: Make the most of your beauty rest with Proactiv(R) Solution's Clarifying Night Cream. It's formulated with retinol, vitamins, and salicylic acid to help treat and prevent acne blemishes while helping to refine and clarify the skin's tone and texture. This luxurious cream will help restore moisture and unplug pores while giving your skin a radiant glow. Simply cleanse the skin thoroughly, then cover the affected area with a thin layer 1 to 3 times daily

title: Proactive Solution Revitalizing Toner 8FL OZ
description: Proactiv Revitalizing Toner helps to hydrate and soothe your skin, this alcohol-free formula along with glycolic acid removes excess oil and moisturize, your skin will feel refreshed and balanced. It's recommended to use after the Renewing Cleanser.
